================
`pybctc` Changes
================

This file summarizes pybctc changes from version to version.

pybctc 0.1.2 (2010-03-03)
=========================
* Updated BCTC load files for 2010.


pybctc 0.1.1 (2010-03-01)
=========================
* Updated to accomodate new upstream BCTC intertie files for 1999-2003,
  2006, 2008, and 2010.

* Test modules updated to better track BCTC data files.


pybctc 0.1 (2010-02-24)
=======================
* Initial Release
